1.0.name: wordpress/wp-easycart
1.0.description:
WP EasyCart eCommerce plugin is a simple install into new or existing WordPress blogs and websites. Get a full eCommerce and shopping cart system in WordPress within minutes! Sell products, downloadable goods, gift cards, clothing and more! And now with WordPress, the powerful features are still very easy to administrate!

WP EasyCart provides administrative software, so there is no need to use WordPress as a management system for your products. Desktop PC, Mac, iPad, and Android software is available to download and allows you to control the myriad of options the software has to offer.

POPULAR LINKS

  • WP EasyCart website
  • Online Demos and Themes
  • Online Documentation
